fixes.name: title date
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]) = TRUE(),
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date],
    SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) per rules. Mapped the Tableau IF to DAX IF and referenced the calculated field [Max Date] on the same table as 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
